name: X Racing Cars Road: Traffic
description:
◉ X Racing Cars Road Runner ◉
◉◉ Atypical Car Race! The police chases you through a village and a circuit! ◉◉

You've always dreamed of having a sport car and you could not help but steal your preferred car when you saw it parked on the street...

The police was passing undercover and is now pursuing you with a green car!

Try to escape and survive by racing through stunning locations with plenty of surprises along the way.

You'll never see a runner car racing game like this one!

Dodge rivals, obstacles, ramps and avoid making crashes while you're at the controls of your brand new robbed sports car!

Collect all the power-ups you see on the road to improve your sports car and make it invincible!

Download the game and discover a crazy car racing runner, where other vehicles are involved and in which you have to keep a lot of concentration!

Escape with the car of your dreams!
